titleStmt.title: Daniel W. Lindsey, General Orders, No. 7
CWG13996

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

body.p:
2
Adjutant Generals Office
Frankfort March 29 1865
General Orders
No 7.

I. " " " Major C. W. Quiggens is hereby exonerated from liability on the certified invoice as shewn by the evidence produced before the Court of Inquiry called by General Orders No 5 current series from these Head Quarters, and his accounts will be settled accordingly.
II. " " " The Court of Inquiry convened by General Orders No 5 current series from these Head Quarters is hereby dissolved.

By order of the Governor
D, W, Lindsey
Adjutant General of Ky
